description:
This course will give you all the necessary tools and tips you need to get out there and start making money now shooting your best yoga/health/wellness online videos. You will be able pick the best tools and equipment, address the main pitfalls and stumbling blocks everyone runs into, and deftly record, process and get your awesome content out to the world! In 6 videos, I've laid out only the most important information that will teach you, in the fastest possible time:

- what camera to pick for your needs according to cost/style/performance

- the best, most necessary and affordable equipment to get

- how to make creative, interesting, engaging and awesome original content

- where and how to get the best shots, and how to deal with the most common problems

- how to upload and edit videos to make the most your valuable content

- where and how to put your videos up for maximum exposure and passive income!- and so much more.

The course is structured to guide you along this journey from nuts to bolts - and help you skip over the potholes that can sideline so many adventures along the way!

Beyond the fundamental 6 videos, I've added additional materials including awesome, informative websites and infographics that can aid in your learning.

If you're ready to go all-in, you could easily complete this over the course of a day! But I might recommend you take a little time between each class, to process, review the extras, and perhaps take a little time to make a plan to act on what you've just learned. This way it will be most fresh, and truly most valuable - when applied!

And when you apply each section, it gives you the best preparation for the next one. This way you can get the maximum value and make the most of your time!

This course has already been tested and approved by tons of eager students! Now it's your turn. The greatest barrier to your dreams will always be your own inaction. Start today!

"One day you finally knew what you had to do, and began." â€“ Mary Oliver
title: Shoot Your Best Yoga Videos!
